Title: The monkey and the camel
Text: At last, when one of his huge feet came within an inch of King Lion's nose, the animals were so disgusted that they set upon the Camel in a rage and drove him out into the desert.

Title: The tortoise and The hare
Text: The Hare was soon far out of sight, and to make the Tortoise feel very deeply how ridiculous it was for him to try a race with a Hare, he lay down beside the course to take a nap until the Tortoise should catch up.

Title: The fox and the grapes
Text: The bunch hung from a high branch, and the Fox had to jump for it. The first time he jumped he missed it by a long way. So he walked off a short distance and took a running leap at it, only to fall short once more. Again and again he tried, but in vain.

Title: Herculues and the wagoner
Text: The farmer climbed down from his seat and stood beside the wagon looking at it but without making the least effort to get it out of the rut. All he did was to curse his bad luck and call loudly on Hercules to come to his aid. Then, it is said, Hercules really did appear, saying:

Title: Lionel Richie
Text: Hello, is it me you are looking for, and I wonder where you are and I wonder what you do, you always will be in my dreams

Title: For whom the bell tolls
Text: biggest fight on the hill to the honey day, substitute, take a look to the sky just before you die, it's your last time wow

Title: How to survive in PHD
Text: Read lots and lots of papers, and think about them, as soon as you have an idea that can improve another paper's idea a bit, start replicating and implementing your idea. You'll learn a lot while doing that. Then start more papers and try to integrate them with your implementation. Then, you are a good Phd student.

Title: Poccono mountains
Text: We came here with lots of foods on Friday morning. Tiphanie and Fariba chilled the entire day while I was coding for LLIF. I love the project although I didn't spend enough time on it. I hope this is satisfactory.

Title: Life is like a barren place
Text: Life is like a barren place, you would like a human face, it's like a journey I don't have a plan for. Didn't tell you enough about myself. I am very nice. Laughter

Title: Advice about life
Text: Start learning new things on regular basis. If you want to be successful, you should try to rehearse on what you learned until you learn it completely. Don't be shy and ask questions but try to also learn why things work the way they work. Drink enough water and have a well-defined goal.

Title: Iran
Text: Iran is located in middle-east or better to mention west Asia. It has four seasons all year long depending on where you are. If you are in north west in summer, it can be cold. At the same time, south part of Iran is burning hot. It has lots of different cultures and ethnicities. Very different people but what is interesting is that unlike other parts of the world, People kept their traditions very seriously.

Title: Death in the family
Text: How crazy it is to lose two of the most important members of your family 3 months apart? I lost my grandma in November and my uncle in February 2020. He was only 56 years old and he seemed very healthy. He was always energetic and worried about his family. He was doing his best to keep his family super happy and they were. He son is 13 and he is in puberty. Hope he can tolerate this big loss.

Title: Booze
Text: what type of booze you like? I used to drink a lot of beers but recently, I get headache when I drink beers. Isn't it weird? It is because I was among the people who wouldn't experience hangover that often but how about now. Almost every time I drank I got the headache.

Title: Mojdeh and Saeed
Text: Mojdeh and Saeed live in NYC. They are doing great, thank God. I am happy that we are closer to them compared to the time that I was in NC. But the sad news is that none of the companies that I am applying for is close to this area. One is in NC, one in LA, and the other one in Berkley. I also have a pending application from Panasonic but I prefer to go somewhere that they know more about programming.
